text:
Gloria Gwynne Gilford (born July 27, 1946) is a retired American actress and psychotherapist. She appeared in several television series in the 1970s and 1980s, including "A New Kind of Family", "The Young Lawyers" and "The Waverly Wonders", and had roles in the movies "Beware! The Blob" (1972), "Satan's School for Girls" (1973), "Fade to Black" (1980) and "Masters of the Universe" (1987).
She is married to actor Robert Pine. They are the parents of the actor Chris Pine and Katherine Pine.
